Mapping Specifications

Source: vignettes/mapping_spec.Rmd
mapping_spec.Rmd

Mapping Workflows

Currently, there exist 13 domains that have respective workflows that require mapping from source/raw data:

  • AE
  • COUNTRY
  • DATACHG
  • DATAENT
  • ENROLL
  • LB
  • PD
  • QUERY
  • SDRGCOMP
  • SITE
  • STUDCOMP
  • STUDY
  • SUBJ

Each of the above 13 domains generally map directly 1-to-1 from a raw source, except COUNTRY which relies on the same dataset as SUBJ. The following variables/types from their respective domains is REQUIRED in the source/raw data:

##      Domain              Variable      Type
## 1        AE                subjid character
## 2        AE                 aeser character
## 3    ENROLL               studyid character
## 4    ENROLL                 invid character
## 5    ENROLL               country character
## 6    ENROLL                subjid character
## 7    ENROLL             subjectid character
## 8    ENROLL              enrollyn character
## 9        LB                subjid character
## 10       LB            toxgrg_nsv character
## 11       PD                subjid character
## 12       PD       deemedimportant character
## 13 SDRGCOMP                subjid character
## 14 SDRGCOMP                sdrgyn character
## 15 SDRGCOMP                 phase character
## 16 STUDCOMP                subjid character
## 17 STUDCOMP                compyn character
## 18     SUBJ               studyid character
## 19     SUBJ                 invid character
## 20     SUBJ               country character
## 21     SUBJ                subjid character
## 22     SUBJ           subject_nsv character
## 23     SUBJ              enrollyn character
## 24     SUBJ           timeonstudy   integer
## 25     SUBJ                subjid character
## 26     SUBJ                compyn character
## 27  DATACHG           subject_nsv character
## 28  DATACHG             n_changes   integer
## 29  DATACHG                subjid character
## 30  DATACHG           subject_nsv character
## 31  DATAENT           subject_nsv character
## 32  DATAENT        data_entry_lag   integer
## 33  DATAENT                subjid character
## 34  DATAENT           subject_nsv character
## 35    QUERY           subject_nsv character
## 36    QUERY           querystatus character
## 37    QUERY              queryage   integer
## 38    QUERY                subjid character
## 39    QUERY           subject_nsv character
## 40  COUNTRY               country character
## 41  COUNTRY                 invid character
## 42  COUNTRY                subjid character
## 43     SITE               studyid character
## 44     SITE                 invid character
## 45     SITE InvestigatorFirstName character
## 46     SITE  InvestigatorLastName character
## 47     SITE                Status character
## 48     SITE                  City character
## 49     SITE                 State character
## 50     SITE               Country character
## 51     SITE               studyid character
## 52     SITE                 invid character
## 53     SITE                subjid character
## 54     SITE                Status character
## 55    STUDY               studyid character
## 56    STUDY              nickname character
## 57    STUDY        protocol_title character
## 58    STUDY                Status character
## 59    STUDY         num_plan_site   integer
## 60    STUDY         num_plan_subj   integer
## 61    STUDY              act_fpfv      Date
## 62    STUDY              est_fpfv      Date
## 63    STUDY              est_lplv      Date
## 64    STUDY              est_lpfv      Date
## 65    STUDY      therapeutic_area character

## 67    STUDY                 phase character
## 68    STUDY               product character
